title: Pink Floyd Live -1994 Pay Per View - Live at Earl's Court
description:
POTWDVD015
Pink Floyd 1994-10-20 PPV

Source: Second generation VHS from 1994-11-01 Pay Per View broadcast. Source tape audio is in mono. Audio dubbed from a stereo roio from the same broadcast. Dubbed in audio from source tape where missing from stereo roio. Due to this, the beginning of SOYCD, Speak To Me, and Wish You Were Here will be slightly lower in volume and sound quality.

Equipment used: Panasonic AGW1 VCR > Datavideo TBC-100 Time Base Corrector > Datavideo DAC-100 Digital Video Bridge > Firewire > Hard Drive.

Software: 
	Scenealyzer - Capturing
	Virtual Dub - Extract audio from avi
	Cool Edit Pro - Sync stereo audio to source audio
	Soft Encode - Create DD 2.0 audio
	Tmpgenc - Create mpeg2 video stream
	DVD Lab - DVD authoring

Set List:
	Shine On You Crazy Diamond
	Learning To Fly
	High Hopes
	Take It Back
	Coming Back To Life
	Sorrow
	Keep Talking
	Another Brick In The Wall Part 2
	One Of These Days

	Speak To Me
	Breathe
	On The Run
	Time/Breathe Reprise
	Great Gig In The Sky
	Money
	Us And Them
	Any Colour You Like
	Brain Damage
	Eclipse
	Wish You Were Here
	Comfortably Numb
	Run Like Hell
